title: How to disable the giant "Search with DuckDuckGo" banner that appears on typing "d" in the URL bar?
content:
Firefox 91

See screenshot.

I've been a Firefox user since the days of 2.0. I know what DuckDuckGo is, what search is, what it does and how to use it. I've set this search engine up myself! I don't need a tutorial.

How can I disable this misfeature?

Thanks, Alex
creator: alexander.rymashevskiy

title: Creating a user profile
content:
Dear Mozilla support,

I have a Windows 10 machine that I'd like to apply new security settings to each user (block dangerous downloads, disable pop-up windows, automatic updates set, etc.). Is there a way I can create a few new security setting and push them to all the user on a machine?

If there is, would the process be the same for Windows 2019 server and Ubuntu?

Thank you, Bert
creator: bnakagawa

title: /usr/lib/firefox/firefox -new-window is consuming cpu
content:
HI there

i was observing my htop on ubuntu and /usr/lib/firefox/firefox -new-window was frequently on top with a cpu consuming often above 50% and sometimes topped 100%

i removed an extension (IM translator) and it lowered down oscilling between 3-12% with peaks to 50% but very rarely

i noticed as well that it raises when there are messages such as firefox relay to be read

just to let you know, before removing IM translator it was a bad problem now it's only bothering

regards Stefano Buttarelli
creator: stefano.buttarelli

title: Updates causes profile errors on second PC
content: I have firefox synced across 2 PCs both set to auto install updates. When one has auto updated and I come to use the second, I get a message that my profile cannot be used on an old version and I am required to create a new profile (or exit firefox). I have to then update and re-sync which is very annoying.
creator: david.lindon

title: Firefox Extremely Slow Only for Yahoo Email
content: Firefox is extremely slow only for Yahoo email, no problem using gmail, aol. mail.com, and others. Tried the usual fixes (refresh/resetting Firefox, cleaning computer, etc.) to no avail. Using Windows 10, all updates installed. Thanks for any help you can give me!

title: error while creating logins to be saved - using latest firefox on mac
content:
i use firefox on both my desktop (windows) and laptop (macbook). I try to sync the 2 so that the logins (passwords saved) on firefox desktop but although i am logged in and synced in firefox macbook (bookmarks have been synced) the saved logins dont. The firefox macbook saved logins are empty. I tried exporting them in csv from the desktop and import them in macbook but it shows an error. i even tried to manually save a login in macbook (in the lockwise section of logins) and still shows an error.

thanks

title: Text Out of alignment (with GaugeMeter.js)
content:
I have a website that uses GaugeMeter.js component. The text of the gauges are out of alignment (as shown in the screenshot) -- which never the case when it is opened with Chrome Browser (i.e. always centered and within the circle/arc).

Strangely, sometime it works well when I started to change the Firefox window width (it is a responsive page).

Anyone came across this? Any idea to solve this?

title: Necesito ayuda; hay un pequeño glitch con la barra de direcciones en Firefox
content:
A veces, cuando abro un link largo en una pestaña, la calidad de la fuente se degrada, para todas las pestañas en general. Es cuestión de minimizar y maximizar el navegador, cambiar de pestañas, entre otros, para que la calidad de la tipografía de la barra de direcciones vuelva a a normalidad, pero quería saber si hay algún modo en el que puedo arreglar o configurar para que esta calidad no se degrade en ningún momento.

Dejo una imagen para que vean la comparación. La de arriba es la de calidad baja, y la de abajo, es la que sí tiene buena calidad.
creator: kedala4904

title: Old Firefox data - is it dangerous/important?
content:
I was testing this app in sandbox and it got an error because it was trying to access old firefox data but it was stopped

This got me wondering, does the old firefox data contain stuff that can easily be accessed? I know it contains some important stuff like passwords, but can anyone access that or are they safely encrypted? Not just that though, everything else as well? Because I kinda need to use the app as it's important but I also don't wanna run it outside the sandbox as it seems suspicious now

title: Online banking
content:
The following is the msg I get when attempting to enter my bank acct at Fifth Third Bank (www.53.com) after applying ID & password. Having responded to the msg several times, I phoned 53 bank and am told that there is a glitch with/at Firefox; (they) have had several complaints and to contact your support desk.

I can get there using Microsoft Edge but prefer using Firefox. Until recently (within the month) I have had no problems accomplishing a connection using Firefox. About the same time (don't know if there is a connection) I am getting error msgs, no msgs, no connects, while attempting to connect to gmail and other programs. Suddenly there is a very slow connection and a lot of info msgs re handshakes etc flashing in the lower left of my screen. Have tried reinstalling Firefox to no avail. Computer repair says computer OK. Still no connection with the bank. s/ Bruce

Bnk msg :::::::::

Oops, something went wrong. If you don't think you should have received this message, you can go back and try again, or you may contact Customer Service at 1-800-972-3030.

Reference Number: 3e71d7d

IP Address: [REDACTED BY MODERATOR]''

[Personal information removed by moderator. Please read Mozilla Support rules and guidelines, thanks.]
creator: bemoore60

title: Mail to: changed from outlook to gmail
content: When I now hit "file" then "mail to" gmail demands (https://www.google.com/gmail/about/) that I open an account instead of my usual Outlook being used. Historically, I have used a gmail account for other business and both have remained separate programs. I want to return to using Outlook as my default program. It is still listed and chosen by me to be my default app but it is not working that way. Thanks for any and all help.
